reviews.review: I literally beat this in a few hours. Its an amazing way to kil a couple of hours
Very well-designed puzzles based on a fantastic concept. Great humorous atmosphere. And such tasty cake!

[[ 그래픽 ]]
□ 황홀함

□ 괜찮음

□ 불편함

□ 알맞음
□ 괜찮음
□ 싫증남
□ 구림

□ 게임이 나를 엄마보다 잘 챙겨줌
□ 유저 친화적
■ 크게 불편하지 않음
□ 약간 귀찮음
□ 비효율적이고 답답함
□ 플레이 자체가 노동

□ 할머니댁 컴퓨터
□ 노트북

□ 적당한 컴퓨터

□ 초고사양 컴퓨터

□ 번역이 원본을 뛰어넘음
■ 제대로 한국어화가 되어있음
□ 한국어화가 되어있는데 애매함
□ 유저 한국어화가 되어있음
□ 유저 한국어가 되어있는데 애매함
□ 비한국어화지만 지장 없음
□ 비한국어화로 플레이가 어려움

[[ DLC ]]
■ 없음
□ 캐릭터 꾸밈 컨텐츠나 가벼운 추가 컨텐츠(무기, 아이템, 추가 임무)를 구매할 수 있음
□ 확장판 수준의 컨텐츠 추가 DLC가 하나 혹은 몇 개 있음
□ 컨텐츠의 대부분을 DLC로 발매함
□ DLC를 구매하지 않으면 게임 플레이에 지장이 있음

[[ 모드 ]]
□ 모드가 이 게임의 핵심
□ 다양하고 종류가 많음

■ 텍스처 개선 및 커스텀 스킨 등 가벼운 모드 위주
□ 모드 설치 불가능 / 모드 제작자 없음

□ 세 살 조카도 가능

□ 난이도를 줄이는 방법이 있음
□ 적응되면 할 만함
□ 고인물 게임
□ 사람이 할 짓이 아님

[[ 스토리 ]]
□ 소름 돋음
□ 튼튼하고 독창적임

□ 무난함
□ 무난하지만 엉성함

□ 뇌를 씻고 싶다

□ 레벨 디자인 교과서

□ 플레이 불가 수준

□ 정신을 차리고 보니 다음날
□ 시간이 너무 잘 감

□ 적당함
□ 집중이 안 됨

[[ 중독성 ]]
□ 일상생활이 안 됨
□ 다른 일을 하다가도 생각이 남
□ 가끔씩 하고 싶음
■ 엔딩 본 이후로 안하게 됨
□ 이런 게임이 있었나..?

[[ 노가다 ]]
■ 필요 없음
□ 필요한 부분만 하면 됨
□ 노가다를 해야 해금되는 요소가 있음
□ 게임 내의 불편한 점을 해소하려면 노가다를 해야함
□ 노가다를 여러가지 해야 됨
□ 노가다를 하지 않으면 아예 진행이 안 됨

[[ 게임성 ]]
□ 완벽에 가까움
■ 정교함
□ 쫄깃함
□ 적절함
□ 부족함
□ 지루함
□ 게임이 아님
□ AVGN

It was an okay build up and its a nice tutorial like game for portal 2. since most of the mechanics from that game came back. But i didnt like it since it was missing the fact it was long. The testing facility felt like the purgatory room between life and death. It was immense boring, just simple puzzles needed to be done. But everything besides it was okay. not great not bad, iI dont recommend buying the game as a stand alone and not buying portal 2 afterwards since most missions were in the facility. not out. 
I give this game a 4,5/10 
But its also a game out 2007 which could've made it harder to make or smth.
THIS IS JUST A GREAT GAME!! Anyone could play it! its fun to play, and beating GLaDOS is the best part
10/10, would do puzzles for cake again.
Um jogo de puzzle incrível, me senti muito genial depois de terminar
이게임을 하면 속이 부대낄 때 30분만해도 바로 화장실에서 토를 할 수 있는 굉장히 유용한 게임입니다.진짜 멀미 줫나나요.fps멀미잘느끼는 유저분들은 비추천
The game-play and concept are fun and exhilarating.
Really fun and short experience. The levels flow beautiful and the atmosphere is so unique.

It may not be a very long game, but Portal is absolutely brilliant. The level design is incredible, and the game as a whole leaves nothing more to be desired. Looking forward to playing the second game!
Game is good but it only has a campaign.
Still a great game. Can be a little messy staying orientated with the controller scheme. But, doesn't take long to play through, and is mostly enjoyable the whole way through.
Перша частина не така насичена як друга, але можу сказати що теж цікава. Пройшов за 3 години. Раджу для покупки якщо будете брати також другу частину.
Prosta krótka oraz wciągająca. Klasyka gier
Play this then play Portal 2 after you will not regret it. This game series is the best fvcking series I've ever played in my life. Just do it.
super fun and small game but portal 2 is sooooooooo fun
Not as good as portal 2 but still good.

I'm 22. About to be 23 in a few months. Here's my story.

When I was 14, I got struck down with depression. This led to me missing a lot of school in highschool and ultimately finishing 9th grade with a single credit.

I spent the rest of my teens trying to play catch up, finally receiving my high school diploma by age 19.

But when things seemed to be going well at 19, I was attacked and nearly raped. By the same relative who molested me my entire childhood. I became suicidal and was diagnosed with PTSD a year later.

At age 20, my mom died from cancer. She was a single parent and raised me all on her own since my deadbeat father left when I was 1.

I was now suffering from daily flashbacks due to my disorder.
Grieving the loss of the only parent I ever had.
And sobbing regularly thanks to the horrific things my father said to me while my mom lay dying in her hospital bed.

At 21, I dropped out of university.
I spent the rest of that year taking odd jobs at factories to pay my bills.

When I turned 22, I thought for sure it was my time to shine and begin living my life...

And then COVID happened.

I turn 23 on Dec 11.

I know I didn't waste my early 20s since I was suffering from so much traumatic ♥♥♥♥ in the span of a few years that others experience over a lifetime, some never at all.

But as I begin my 23rd year. I feel lost.
My PTSD has been in remission for over a year. And I've healed from the loss of my mother... but I'm struggling to shake the feeling that I lost so much time, and will always play catch up with others in the same life arena.

I don't really know why I wrote all this down, but I guess if there's any other lonely soul out there who happens to see my comment, I just want you to know that you got this.

We didn't choose our life circumstances.
We didn't ask for our lives to go off plan.

But we are alive
We're healthy
We've been blessed with another day

If you're the same age as me, our lives are only just beginning.
If you're older, you too can realize your dreams, escape the rigid safety found in your daily routine, and live the life you thought could never be possible.

If you still got a pulse, God still has a purpose.

If you're still hurting, talk to someone about it.

If you feel bored, get lost in a good book.

If you feel lost or confused, reconnect with that inner child and find time to spend doing the things you loved so much as a little one.

I hope to revisit this review in a few years, perhaps before my 20s are up so I can update how my life has gone since then. Til then...

Take care internet stranger. You got this. :)
